content:
Cool feature just dropped for @SuperGrok subscribers. 

Turn on Companions in settings.

RT @tetsuoai: Fed Grok4 Heavy my massive assembler repo. In ~6 mins, it cleaned up everything, optimized files, and returned them working perfectly. Same codebase in Cursor + MAX? Gemini, Claude, GPT all wrecked it.

RT @MarioNawfal: üá®üá¶ CANADA JUST CROWNED GROK #1 - ELON‚ÄôS AI IS TAKING OVER

GROK is now the #1 app in Canada, crushing the charts and leaving ChatGPT, TikTok, Threads, and every other app in the dust.

That‚Äôs right - Elon‚Äôs unfiltered, always-online AI just bodied the competition and went full maple-powered viral.

This is a statement: people want AI with edge - not training wheels.

No filters. No fluff. 

Raw, real-time, truth-seeking chaos, straight from ùïè.

Canada gets it. The rest of the world might be next.

üá≠üá∞ TOP PRODUCTIVITY APP: GROK HITS NR. 1 ON HONG KONG APP STORE

Grok just claimed the top spot for productivity in Hong Kong‚Äôs App Store.

AI with vibes is officially taking over the world.

Source: App Store

RT @JoeTegtmeyer: I now have taken 116 @robotaxi rides, over 380 miles, have given several dozens of people, most I had never met, the opportunity to be a passenger and have video of each giving their honest, first hand impressions after their experience with the service.

I think it is fair to say many people are very excited & interested in finding out more!

I am about to meet Konnie who flew in from South Dakota, a person who reached out to me to try @robotaxi and wanted to try the service for herself.

Konnie is blind and runs a webcast for other blind people who are empowered to live a life full of energy and independence. I‚Äôm looking forward to her thoughts, feedback & suggestions for the @Tesla team! Stay tuned for more!

I think it is fair to say many people are very excited & interested in finding out more!

I am about to meet Konnie who flew in from South Dakota, a person who reached out to me to try @robotaxi and wanted to try the service for herself.

Konnie is blind and runs a webcast for other blind people who are empowered to live a life full of energy and independence. I‚Äôm looking forward to her thoughts, feedback & suggestions for the @Tesla team! Stay tuned for more!

RT @astro_Pettit: High resolution star trail from the SpaceX Crew 9 Dragon, marked by a fleet of flashing Starlink satellites, glowing atmosphere, soon to rise sun, and arcing stars. 

Captured over the Pacific Ocean with Nikon Z9, Sigma 14mm f1.4 lens, effective 24 minute exposure compiled from individual 30 second frames, f1.4, ISO 1600.

High resolution star trail from the SpaceX Crew 9 Dragon, marked by a fleet of flashing Starlink satellites, glowing atmosphere, soon to rise sun, and arcing stars. 

Captured over the Pacific Ocean with Nikon Z9, Sigma 14mm f1.4 lens, effective 24 minute exposure compiled from individual 30 second frames, f1.4, ISO 1600.
